resources.string: Vladimir Putin was the Russian president in 2000
Victor Chernomirdin had been the russian president just for 1 day
In 2018\'s president elections Alexey Navalniy became the president of Russia
After the final results of 2018\'s president elections popular candidate - Pavel Grudinin refused to shave off his gorgeous moustache as he would promise if he loosed
Nowadays Vladimir Putin has special man who will collect and take president\'s guano if Putin decides to use the toilet
Are you sure you want to do this?
